scripts.preview: pnpm run build && CLOUDFLARE_ENV='' vite preview
scripts.compile: cd circuit-noir && nargo compile && cp target/circuit.json ../worker/container_src/circuit.json
scripts.execute: cd circuit-noir && nargo execute && cp target/circuit.gz ../worker/container_src/circuit.gz
scripts.prove: rm -rf ~/.bb-crs && cd circuit-noir && bb prove -b target/circuit.json -w target/circuit.gz -o target && cp -rf ~/.bb-crs ../worker/container_src
scripts.nargo: pnpm run compile && pnpm run execute && pnpm run prove && cd circuit-noir && nargo test
